    42	    """this function performs classification over the saved activations, the classification can be module-wise and token-wise (i.e. vertical)
    43	
    44	    Args:
    45	        prompting_results (pd.DataFrame): the dataframe with all the activations resulting from the prompting
    46	        include_mlps (bool): whether to include the MLPs or not
    47	        include_mlps_l1 (bool): whether to include the first layer of the MLPs or not
    48	        include_mhsa (bool): whether to include the MHSAs or not
    49	        vertical (bool): whether to train the classifier vertically (by token) or all at once
    50	        position (str): the token where the classification is performed (subject_query, object, or relation_query)
    51	    """
